election_record.label: New Jersey 1795 Assembly, Morris County, Special

overview.note: "On Monday the 9th inst. an election for a member to supply the place of Aaron Kitchel, Esq. in the Legislature of this state, commenced at Morris-Town; Col. Ellis Cook and Dr. William Canfield, jun. were nominated - on Friday evening last the poll closed and we are informed that the votes taken are as follow: For Cook, 1373, Canfield, 1003." Woods's Newark Gazette and Paterson Advertiser (Newark, NJ). February 18, 1795.

election_record.reference: Woods's Newark Gazette and Paterson Advertiser (Newark, NJ). February 18, 1795.
